job.title: VMWare Systems Engineer
job.industry: Computer Software,Information Technology and Services,Computer Networking
job.description: Job SummaryResponsible for supporting the VMware initiatives, automation, operational support of infrastructure components and supporting technologies.Reviews market trends and collaborate with vendors and other technology teams to develop infrastructure solutions.Provide VMware infrastructure design and support, with a specific focus on VMware Infrastructure as a Service.Position provides high level competency in the form of standards, design and solution architecture for VMwareâbased services.Qualifications5+ years relevant experience providing infrastructure solutions and support, with a focus on VMware based cloud technologies such as VMware ESXi, VMware Site Recovery Manager, vRealize Automation, VMware NSX, vSphere vCenter and vROPs.Experience with adjacent technologies such as virtualization, networking, automation.Experience with major enterprise hardware platforms, i.e. NutanixExperience With AWS Or Other Cloud Technology a PlusComfortable adapting to dynamic, rapid and shifting environmentsExperience creating innovative and unique solutions for automation using scripting languages and simplifying administration for othersDemonstrated ability to teach new skills and concepts to junior members of the teamStrong communication skills and selfâstarter attitude with a strong ability to exercise independent judgment and critical thinking with minimal supervisionStrong understanding of Enterprise Best PracticesAnalytical and research skills and problem solvingEducationBachelorâs degree preferredIf interested please forward your resume to kevin@libertyjobs.com#associate#mid#IT#vmwareCode: libertynull
